titleStmt.title: The idea of the lavv charactered from Moses to King Charles. Whereunto is added the idea of government and tyranny. / By John Herdon Gent. Philonomos.
titleStmt.author: Heydon, John, b. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold in St. Dunstans-church-yard in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Includes: "The idea of government", with a separate dated title page, register continuous; "The idea of tyranny", with a separate dated title page, continuous register and separate pagination.
With two final leaves of advertisements.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
